rows.label: tlk43400012_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Drivers can borrow the power of their
Blades even outside of battle.

rows.label: tlk43400012_02_msg0002
rows.name:
They can open locks for you,
leap great distances...

rows.label: tlk43400012_02_msg0003
rows.name:
If there's something you can't
do, well, maybe your Blade can.

rows.label: tlk43400012_02_msg0004
rows.name:
My life would be a whole lot
easier if I were a Driver...

rows.label: tlk43400012_02_msg0005
rows.name:
It's hard enough as it is keeping
tabs on Bahn's movements right now.

rows.label: tlk43400012_02_msg0006
rows.name:
He's definitely planning
something, I just know it...
